original_title: In Search of Voodoo: Roots to Heaven
overview: In Search of Voodoo: Roots to Heaven captures the vibrant tales of Voodoo in West Africa. Following actor Djimon Hounsou back to Benin, the country of his birth, the film shines a positive light on this way of life that has been misrepresented and diabolized in Western culture for many years.
title: In Search of Voodoo: Roots to Heaven
